      • renameFields

        private static java.lang.String renameFields(java.lang.String s)
        This function is called in the beginning to rename all the necessary fields to alias + fieldname, i.e. SELECT A.FIELD1 FROM TABLE1 A will become SELECT A.AFIELD1 FROM TABLE1 A. This is to avoid duplicate fieldnames in the mapping from different tables.
        Parameters:
        s - The query we want to process.
        Returns:
        The processed query.

      • dissectQRY

        private static java.lang.String dissectQRY(java.lang.String query)
        This function dissects the query. First it checks if the query contains a subquery. If it does, it calls itself and passes that subquery as a parameter. It does the same with joins and where's.
        Parameters:
        query - The query to dissect
        Returns:
        The updated query.

      • countJoins

        private static java.lang.Integer countJoins(java.lang.String qry)
        This function counts the number of joins in the given query
        Parameters:
        qry - The query to analyze.
        Returns:
        An integer representing the number of joins in the query.

      • updateAliases

        private static java.lang.String updateAliases(java.lang.String query)
        This function updates the aliases of the query. It will look for the tablenames and check if their alias corresponds.
        Parameters:
        query - The query to update.
        Returns:
        The updated query.

      • analyzeQRY

        private static java.lang.String analyzeQRY(java.lang.String s)
        This function checks the query to see what kind of mapping it needs to be transformed into. It checks i.e. if the query is a join and calls the corresponding function to create the mapping. It then prints the mapping and adds it to the array of powermarts.
        Parameters:
        s - The query.
        Returns:
        Returns a string with the new query.

      • getJoinCondition

        private static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getJoinCondition(java.lang.String s)
        This function gets the joincondition of the given joinquery.
        Parameters:
        s - The query with the join.
        Returns:
        It returns an ArrayList of Strings with all the conditions.

      • convToJoiner

        private static corp.everis.pwc.raw.POWERMART convToJoiner(java.lang.String mSrc,
                                                          java.lang.String sMAlias,
                                                          java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> sfM,
                                                          java.lang.String dSrc,
                                                          java.lang.String sDAlias,
                                                          java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> sfD,
                                                          java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> tfss,
                                                          java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> conds,
                                                          java.lang.String joinType)
        This function creates a POWERMART-object containing a mapping with a joinertransformation, based on the given join-query.
        Parameters:
        mSrc - The name of the Master source table.
        sMAlias - The alias of the Master source table.
        sfM - An ArrayList of the sourcefieldnames from the Master source table.
        dSrc - The name of the Detail source table.
        sDAlias - The alias of the Detail source table.
        sfD - An ArrayList of the sourcefieldnames from the Detail source table.
        tfss - An ArrayList of the targetfieldnames from both source tables.
        conds - An ArrayList with the joinconditions.
        joinType - The type of join.
        Returns:
        A POWERMART object containing the mapping with the jointransformation.

      • convToSelFil

        private static corp.everis.pwc.raw.POWERMART convToSelFil(java.lang.String srcTbl,
                                                          java.lang.String srcAlias,
                                                          java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> sourcefieldnames,
                                                          java.lang.String filtercondition)
        This function creates a POWERMART-object containing a mapping with a filtertransformation, based on the given filter-query.
        Parameters:
        srcTbl - The name of the source table.
        srcAlias - The alias of the source table.
        sourcefieldnames - An ArrayList of the sourcefieldnames from the source table.
        filtercondition - The filtercondition of the filter.
        Returns:
        A POWERMART object containing the mapping with the jointransformation.

      • convToSort

        private static corp.everis.pwc.raw.POWERMART convToSort(java.lang.String srcTbl,
                                                        java.lang.String srcAlias,
                                                        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> sourcefieldnames)
        This function creates a POWERMART-object containing a mapping with a sorterTransformation.
        Parameters:
        srcTbl - The name of the source table.
        srcAlias - The alias of the source table.
        sourcefieldnames - An ArrayList of the sourcefieldnames from the source table.
        Returns:
        A POWERMART object containing the mapping with the jointransformation.

      • convToSelIns

        private static corp.everis.pwc.raw.POWERMART convToSelIns(java.lang.String srcTbl,
                                                          java.lang.String srcAlias,
                                                          java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> sourcefieldnames)
        This function creates a POWERMART-object containing a mapping that just loads the targettable, without any transformations.
        Parameters:
        srcTbl - The name of the source table.
        srcAlias - The alias of the source table.
        sourcefieldnames - An ArrayList of the sourcefieldnames from the source table.
        Returns:
        A POWERMART object containing the mapping.

      • isKeyWord

        private static boolean isKeyWord(java.lang.String s)
        This function compares the given string with the list of keywords at checks if it's in the list or not.
        Parameters:
        s - The string to check.
        Returns:
        True or false depending on the check.

      • unifyPowermarts

        private static void unifyPowermarts()
        This function will create one mapping with all the transformations from the different mappings.

      • createNewPowermart

        private static corp.everis.pwc.raw.POWERMART createNewPowermart()
        This function creates a new POWERMART object with some data filled in.
        Returns:
        A powermart objects with some data, a repository, folder and mapping.

      • createInstances

        private static java.util.ArrayList<corp.everis.pwc.raw.INSTANCE> createInstances(java.util.ArrayList<corp.everis.pwc.raw.TARGET> targets,
                                                                                 java.util.ArrayList<corp.everis.pwc.raw.SOURCE> sources,
                                                                                 java.util.ArrayList<corp.everis.pwc.raw.TRANSFORMATION> trns)
        This function creates the necessary INSTANCE-objects for our mapping.
        Parameters:
        targets - The target for which we want to create an INSTANCE-objects.
        sources - The source for which we want to create an INSTANCE-objects.
        trns - The transformation for which we want to create an INSTANCE-objects.
        Returns:
        An arraylist of INSTANCE-objects containing our generated INSTANCE-objects.

      • previousConnector

        private static corp.everis.pwc.raw.CONNECTOR previousConnector(corp.everis.pwc.raw.CONNECTOR connector,
                                                               java.util.ArrayList<corp.everis.pwc.raw.CONNECTOR> connectors,
                                                               java.util.ArrayList<corp.everis.pwc.raw.CONNECTOR> newConnectors,
                                                               corp.everis.pwc.moam.TableField tf,
                                                               java.util.ArrayList<corp.everis.pwc.raw.TARGET> targets)
        This function looks for the previous connector in our original mapping.
        Parameters:
        connector - The connector whose predecessor we want to find.
        connectors - The connectors from the original mapping where we will try to find the predecessor.
        newConnectors - The list of newly generated connectors, to check if the connector we found is correct.
        tf - Tablefield of the original connector, so we can use it's original fieldname before we concatenated it with it's alias.
        targets - The targets in our mapping.
        Returns:
        The connector that predecedes our connector.
